channel.title: CoD4 Help
channel.description:
I've been playing CoD4 for a few days now. Just got up to the Chernobyl part where you have to assassinate the guy with the sniper. So, I've killed him, got out of the hotel, and then I'm bombarded by grenades and bullets. I take a few guys out, but when the Captain says 'Forget them, lets go', I run and just get killed.
Is there a better way to get to the extraction point? Halp

item.title: CoD4 Help
item.dc:creator: @bankotsu11 bankotsu11
item.description:
@bankotsu11 wrote:

i beat on hardend and its sorta hard on tht lvl but when u goin 2 extraction point duck behind cars and snipe ppl out then run when the fire is low

Read full topic

item.title: CoD4 Help
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I’m doing it on hardened. I’ll try Veteran next time round. I’ll give it another try tomorrow. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: 30-12-2007, 22:22:57[/size][hr]I’m an idiot. I’ve done it now. I realized that I was completely doing the wrong thing, and should of just run :P. Had a bit of trouble with the extraction, but other than that, great mission. Really got my heart pounding

Read full topic

item.title: CoD4 Help
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

what i did was everytime there were lots of enemys id put him down in like aload of bushes, as somehow he still shoots through them but the enemys cant see him… Then i just find all the cover i can and then shoot who i can.

Read full topic

item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Mr.Chris:

I don’t have to pick up a guy or keep him safe.

You just haven’t gotten to that part. I’m gonna play it now and I’m almost on that mission, so I’ll let you know how I done it.

Read full topic

item.title: CoD4 Help
item.dc:creator: @Baros_Rocks Baros Rocks
item.description:
@Baros_Rocks wrote:

Just let the guy you’re carrying make all the shots, he never seems to die.

Read full topic

item.title: CoD4 Help
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I think you guys might be talking about a different mission. I don’t have to pick up a guy or keep him safe. I’ve just rappelled out of the hotel that blew up when I climbed out. Now, I’m surrounded by blown up cars as cover. I snipe a few guys out, but can’t get anywhere near to a gun. I just get bombarded whenever I try to move.

Read full topic

item.title: CoD4 Help
item.dc:creator: @Baros_Rocks Baros Rocks
item.description:
@Baros_Rocks wrote:

Ah this part was quite annoying. The main thing i did was to drop the guy in the middle of the road, he basically never dies and makes good shots. That leaves you to either hide or help take them out, you can either use your pistol or go and loot a machine gun off some guy.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:

Well i had already taken a few of them out so it was like 2 - 4 people shooting at me.

smesme but he might be doing it on vet. Running with enemies shooting at you on veteran difficulty = ded.

item.title: CoD4 Help
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Heh, i just grabbed the guy and kept running apart from taking one stop to drop the guy off in a safe place and take a few people out who were infront of me.

Read full topic

item.title: CoD4 Help
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

I can’t really remember, but when you exit the building by rappelling down the wall you run for a while, then a helicopter comes. You shoot that down and then the other soldier gets hurt, you have to carry him. Whilst carrying him it’s pretty tough, but once you get to the extraction point it’s pretty fun and easy.

When you’re running through all the enemies, the best thing to do is to get as close as you can (Behind cover) and throw a grenade, then charge in. If you stay at a far distance they just seem to respawn over and over.

I hope that helped :, btw, that’s the best level in CoD4, enjoy it.

Read full topic
